table_description: GitHub Deployments are releases of the app/service/etc to an environment.

columns.name: repository_full_name
columns.description: The full name of the repository (login/repo-name).

columns.name: node_id
columns.description: The node ID of the deployment.

columns.name: commit_sha
columns.description: SHA of the commit the deployment is using.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the deployment was created.

columns.name: environment
columns.description: The name of the environment to which the deployment was made.

columns.name: latest_environment
columns.description: The name of the latest environment to which the deployment was made.

columns.name: latest_status
columns.description: The latest status of the deployment.

columns.name: original_environment
columns.description: The original environment to which this deployment was made.

columns.name: payload
columns.description: Extra information that a deployment system might need.

columns.name: ref
columns.description: Identifies the Ref of the deployment, if the deployment was created by ref.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The current state of the deployment.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the deployment was last updated.
